string.name: Text00
string.value: #eEnd User License Agreement for MapleStory™ Software#n\r\n\r\n

string.name: Text01
string.value: #eIMPORTANT NOTICE:#n The MapleStory™ software and related documentation are the property of Nexon America Inc. (“#eNexon#n”) and its licensors, and are protected by international copyright and other intellectual property laws. Unauthorized installation or use of the MapleStory software is strictly prohibited.\r\n\r\n

string.name: Text02
string.value: This End User License Agreement (“#eEULA#n”) is an agreement between you and Nexon, and governs your installation and use of the MapleStory software. This EULA limits and excludes warranties and remedies regarding the MapleStory software, exempts NEXON and other persons from liability, specifies the jurisdiction for resolution of disputes, and contains other important provisions that you should read. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text03
string.value: By installing or using the MapleStory Software, you acknowledge and signify that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by this EULA. If you do not unconditionally accept and agree to all of the provisions of this EULA, you may not install or use the MapleStory software, and you must permanently delete and destroy all copies of the MapleStory software in your possession or control. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text04
string.value: #e1. The Software:#n In this EULA, “#eSoftware#n” means the computer software designed to be used to play the online game called MapleStory™ (the “#eOnline Game#n”), and all updates, upgrades and enhancements to that software and all related documentation, provided or made available to you by or on behalf of Nexon or any of its affiliates or authorized distributors. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text05
string.value: #e2.Terms of Use:#n You may install and use the Software only if you have accepted and agreed to Nexon's Terms of Use Agreement governing participation in the Online Game (the “#eTerms of Use#n”). In the event of any conflict or inconsistency between this EULA and the Terms of Use, this EULA will take priority and govern. Capitalized terms used in this EULA have the meaning set forth in the Terms of Use or this EULA.\r\n\r\n

string.name: Text06
string.value: #e3. Location and Age Requirements:#n You may not download, install or use the Software unless you are located in the countries from which the Online Game may be accessed, as set forth in the Terms of Use. You may not download, install or use the Software unless you are qualified to open a Nexon account, as set forth in the Terms of Use. If you are a parent or guardian of a minor child who is 13 years or older and lives in your residence, you may permit that child to use the Software in accordance with the License and the other provisions of this EULA and the Terms of Use, and you are fully responsible and liable for all acts and omission by your child as if they were committed by you. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text07
string.value: #e4. License Grant:#n Subject to the provisions of this EULA and the applicable Terms of Use, Nexon hereby grants to you a non-exclusive, personal, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, restricted and limited license during the term of this EULA to install the object-code (machine-readable) version of the Software on your personal computer and use the installed copy of the Software solely for your personal use to play the Online Game in accordance with the applicable Terms of Use (the “#eLicense”). Under no circumstances will Nexon be obligated to provide, nor will you be entitled to receive, obtain or access, any source (human readable) code for the Software. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text08
string.value: #e5. Restrictions:#n\r\n\r\n

string.name: Text09
string.value: #e(a) General:#n You will not directly or indirectly: (a) use the Software in any manner or for any purpose except as expressly permitted by this EULA and the Terms of Use; (b) transfer possession of Software to any other person; (c) copy or reproduce the Software, except to the extent required to install the Software on your own personal computer in order to use the Software in accordance with this EULA; (d) license, sublicense, sell, resell, lend, rent, lease, loan, pledge, share, transfer, assign, pledge, publish, transmit, publicly display or perform, distribute, create any interest in, or otherwise give or make available or permit the access or use of the Software or its functionality to or for the benefit of any other person, whether as a service bureau or otherwise, and with or without charge, except for your minor child as set forth in section; (e) adapt, alter, change, enhance, modify, improve, or translate the Software, create derivative works from or based on the Software, or merge, embed or combine the Software with any other software or materials; (f) reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, convert into human readable format, or otherwise attempt to access or derive the source code of the Software; (g) alter, attempt to circumvent, destroy, obscure, conceal, modify, or remove any notices, proprietary codes or locks, means of identification, digital rights management tools or information, or agreements on, in or in relation to, the Software; or (h) authorize, assist or encourage any other person to do any of the foregoing or to use the Software in a way that would constitute an infringement of Nexon's rights in the Software or a breach of this EULA if it were done by you. You will protect the Software against unauthorized access, distribution or use. Regardless of the number of copies of the Software received by you or the means by which you receive them, each copy of the Software is subject to this EULA.

string.name: Text10
string.value: #e(b) Specific Restrictions:#n Without limiting the generality of paragraph 5(a):

string.name: Text11
string.value: #ei. Private Servers/Games:#n You will use the Software to play only the Online Game that is operated by or on behalf of Nexon and its affiliates, and you will not use the Software to play any other instance of the Online Game (including any instance of the Online Game that is operated using a “private server”). You will not operate any instance of the Online Game that has not been authorized by Nexon or its affiliates.

string.name: Text12
string.value: #eii. Change Operation of Software/Online Game:#n You will not change, directly or indirectly, the functionality, operation or performance of the Software or the Online Game, including by means of any of the following: (1) altering or redirecting the communications protocols used by the Software, or altering, intercepting, or redirecting data communications sent or received by the Software; (2) creating or using a cheat, hack, bypass, decryption, memory altering script or code, cheat engine, bot, or other modification of or addition to the Software; or (3) using the Software by an interface other than the standard user interface presented by the Software. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text13
string.value: #eiii. WZ Files: You will not adapt, alter, change, enhance, modify, improve or translate any of the .wz files included in the Software, create derivative works from or based on any of those .wz files, or merge, embed or combine any of those .wz files with any other software or materials. You will not create, reproduce, publish or distribute any .wz file that is capable of being used with the Software. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text14
string.value: #eiv. Authorization/Assistance:#n You will not authorize, assist or encourage any other person to commit any act or omission that is an infringement of Nexon's rights in the Software or would be a breach of this Agreement if you committed it, including but not limited to creating, designing, publishing, distributing, advertising, selling, promoting or assisting or encouraging the use of, any of the following items relating to the Software or the Online Game: cheats, hacks, bypasses, decryptions, memory altering scripts or codes, cheat engines, bots, or other modifications of or additions to the Software. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text15
string.value: #e(c) Enforcement:#n You acknowledge and agree that your breach of this section 5 will result in irreparable harm, loss and damage to Nexon and its licensors and affiliates for which Nexon and its licensors and affiliates could not be adequately compensated by an award of monetary damages; and in the event of any actual or threatened material breach of those provisions by you, and in addition to all remedies available to Nexon and its licensors and affiliates under this Agreement or otherwise, Nexon will be entitled as a matter of right to judicial relief by way of a restraining order, interim, interlocutory or permanent injunction, or order for specific performance, and you will not oppose the granting of that judicial relief and hereby waive all defences to the strict enforcement of this Agreement. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text16
string.value: #e6. Technological Restrictions/Monitoring:#n The Software contains technologies that restrict and limit the use of the Software, and may deactivate or restrict the functionality or use of the Software if it is not able to communicate over the Internet with computer systems designated by Nexon. The Software may also contain technologies that monitor, record and report to Nexon information regarding the installation and use of the Software, and you hereby consent to Nexon's collection, use, retention and disclosure of that information in accordance with Nexon's Privacy Policy as amended from time to time (available online at www.nexon.net). \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text17
string.value: #e7. Feedback:#n If you give feedback about the Software or the Online Game (including any ideas or suggestions for any enhancements or improvements to the Software) to Nexon or its affiliates, then Nexon and its affiliates and their respective successors, assigns and licensees may use the feedback without providing any compensation to you or any other person. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text18
string.value: #e8. Your Obligations: \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text19
string.value: #e(a) Representations/Warranties:#n You represent and warrant to Nexon that you have the legal right, power, and capacity to enter into and perform your obligations under this EULA, and that all information that you provide to Nexon regarding your use of the Software is true, accurate, current and complete. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text20
string.value: #e(b) Technical Requirements:#n You are solely responsible and liable for obtaining, provisioning, configuring, maintaining, paying for, and protecting from loss and damage, all equipment, software, and services necessary for your use of the Software and all data used in association with the Software. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text21
string.value: #e(c) Applicable Laws:#n You will comply with all applicable laws regarding your use of the Software, including all laws relating to the exportation and transmission of technical data and other regulated materials. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text22
string.value: #e(d) Confidentiality:#n You acknowledge that all non-public information concerning the Software (the “#eConfidential Information#n”) is the proprietary and confidential information and trade secret of Nexon and its licensors. Both during and after the term of this EULA, you will hold all Confidential Information in confidence, will use the Confidential Information only in connection with your use of the Software in accordance with this EULA, and you will prevent any unauthorized use or disclosure of the Confidential Information. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text23
string.value: #e(e) Audit:#n Upon request by Nexon, you will permit Nexon to inspect your computers and other equipment in order to verify your compliance with this EULA. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text24
string.value: #e9. Ownership:#n Nexon and its licensors own and retain all right, title and interest (including copyright and other intellectual property rights), throughout the world in, to and associated with the Software. The Software is licensed (not sold) to you for limited purposes as expressly set forth in this EULA and the Terms of Use. The Software and related intellectual property rights are protected throughout the world by international laws and treaties. Except for the License, you will not acquire any right, title or interest in, to or associated with the Software pursuant to this EULA or otherwise. All rights not expressly granted under this EULA are reserved to Nexon and its suppliers and licensors. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text25
string.value: #e10. Disclaimers/Liability Limitations:#n The disclaimers and liability exclusions and limitations in the applicable Terms of Use are binding upon you in respect of your access to and use of the Software. The following are in addition to, and supplement, the provisions of the Terms of Use: \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text26
string.value: #e(a) Disclaimer:#n Notwithstanding any other provision of this EULA or the Terms of Use, and to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, the Software is provided “as is and with all faults”, and without any representations, warranties, conditions or guarantees of any nature or kind whatsoever, including any representations, warranties, conditions or guarantees of or relating to durability; fitness for a particular purpose; merchantability; non-infringement; performance; quality; results; suitability; timeliness; title; or workmanlike effort; all of which are hereby disclaimed by Nexon to the fullest extent permitted by law. You are solely responsible for the selection of the Software to achieve your intended results, and you install and use the Software at your own risk. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text27
string.value: #e(b) Liability Exclusion:#n Notwithstanding any other provision of this EULA or the Terms of Use, and to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, the Nexon Group is not responsible or liable to you or any other person for any direct or indirect loss or damage (including special, incidental, consequential, and punitive damages) arising from, connected with or relating to the Software or your use or inability to use the Software. this paragraph 10(b) applies to liability under any theory (including contract, tort, strict liability, or any other theory of law or equity or statute), regardless of any negligence or other fault or wrongdoing (including fundamental breach or gross negligence) by Nexon or any person for whom Nexon is responsible, and even if other remedies are not available or do not adequately compensate you for any losses, or Nexon knew or should have known of the possibility of the potential loss or damage being incurred; and in this paragraph 10(b) “Nexon Group” means Nexon and each of its past, present and future suppliers, licensors, and affiliates, and each of their respective past, present and future personnel and representatives. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text28
string.value: #e(c) Consumer Rights Exception: The exclusion or limitation of certain warranties and liabilities is prohibited by law in some jurisdictions, and those prohibitions may apply to you. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text29
string.value: #e11. Term and Termination: This EULA is effective on the date that you first download the Software and will continue in full force and effect unless and until terminated in accordance with this EULA or the Terms of Use. You may in your discretion and for your sole convenience terminate this EULA and the License at any time by uninstalling and permanently deleting and destroying all copies of the Software in your possession or control and delivering an email notice of termination to Nexon. Nexon may in its discretion and for its sole convenience terminate this EULA and the License at any time effective immediately upon notice to you. This EULA and the License will terminate immediately and automatically, without any notice to you, if any of the following occur: (a) you breach this EULA or the Terms of Use; (b) your account regarding the Online Game is terminated; or (c) the Terms of Use are terminated. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text30
string.value: #e12. Consequences of Termination:#n Upon termination of this EULA, the License will immediately terminate, and you will immediately cease using the Software and permanently delete and destroy all copies of the Software in your possession or control (including copies of the Software installed on your computers and other devices). Notwithstanding any other provision of this EULA, if this EULA is terminated for any reason, the following provisions of this EULA, and all other provisions necessary to their interpretation or enforcement, will survive the expiration or termination of this EULA and will remain in full force and effect and be binding upon the Parties as applicable: sections 5, 7, 8(d), 8(e), 9, 10, 12, 13, 14, 15 and 16. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text31
string.value: #e13. Notices:#n Nexon may deliver notices under this EULA to you by email to any email address that you provide to Nexon (including when you register to play the Online Game or download the Software). You will give all notices under this EULA to Nexon in writing delivered to Nexon through the Nexon CS Portal at the following link: http://support.nexon.net. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text32
string.value: #e14. Governing Law and Disputes:#n This EULA and all related matters will be governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of State of California, United States of America, excluding the United Nations Convention On Contracts For The International Sale Of Goods and any rules of private international law or the conflict of laws that would lead to the application of any other law. Any dispute arising from, connected with, or relating to this Agreement, the Software, or any related matter will be resolved by the State or Federal Court (as applicable) located in the County of Los Angeles, United States of America, and you and Nexon each irrevocably submit and attorn to the original and exclusive jurisdiction of those courts for those purposes, waive any jurisdictional, venue or inconvenient forum objections to those courts, and waive all rights to trial by jury. \r\n\r\n

string.name: Text33
string.value: #e15. Prior Software Versions:#n You may no longer use any prior version or release of the Software. Your licenses to use prior versions and releases of the Software are terminated effective immediately.\r\n\r\n

string.name: Text34
string.value: #e16. Miscellaneous:#n If any provision of this EULA is held by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason, then the provision will be deemed to be severed from this EULA and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect without being impaired or invalidated in any way, unless as a result of the severance this EULA would fail in its essential purpose. No consent or waiver by a party to or of any breach by the other party of this EULA will be effective unless in writing and signed by both parties. Except as expressly set forth in this EULA, the parties' respective rights and remedies under this EULA are cumulative and not exclusive of any other rights or remedies to which they may be entitled under this EULA or at law or equity. You may not assign this EULA or any rights under this EULA (including the License). Nexon may in its discretion assign this EULA. This EULA is binding upon and will enure to the benefit of the parties and their respective heirs, executors, administrators, successors and permitted assigns. In this EULA: (a) a reference to “this EULA” refers to this EULA as a whole, and not just to the particular provision in which those words appear; (b) headings are for reference only and do not define, limit or enlarge the scope or meaning of this EULA or any of its provisions; (c)“person” includes an individual, corporation, partnership, joint venture, association, trust, unincorporated organization, society, and any other legal entity; (d) words importing the singular number only include the plural and vice versa; (e)“including” means including without limitation; (f) words importing a gender include both genders; and (g)“discretion” means a party's sole, absolute and unfettered discretion. The parties have expressly requested and required that this EULA and all related documents be written in the English language. This EULA may be modified only by a written instrument that expressly states that it is an amendment to this EULA and is signed by both parties or their successors or permitted assigns. This EULA and the Terms of Use together constitute the complete agreement between the parties with respect to the subject matter of this EULA, and supersede all previous communications, representations, negotiations, discussions, agreements, or understandings, whether oral or written, with respect to the subject matter of this EULA. There are no representations, warranties, terms, conditions, undertakings or collateral agreements, express, implied or statutory, between the parties other than as expressly set forth in this EULA and the Terms of Use. \r\n\r\n
